channel.description: Recent content in Shares on Salina Health Ltd

item.title: AI-powered therapy intelligence
item.description: Salina securely summarises and extracts insights from therapy sessions, saving time so you can focus on helping your clients. Upload audio and Salina automatically finds key concerns, session highlights, markers, plus a transcript and summary. Get started by booking a 15-minute on-boarding session to answer your questions, show you Salina in action, and get you set up for a free account for 6-months (no credit card needed).
